descript.abstract: Florida counties with detailed shoreline. 1:12,000 scale.
descript.purpose: Florida counties with detailed shoreline. 1:12,000 scale.

idinfo.useconst: DISCLAIMER (for maps)The boundaries depicted on this map document are approximate. This map document is intended for use only at the published scale. These data are intended for informational use only and should not be considered authoritative for navigation, engineering, legal, or other site-specific purpose. FDEP does not assume any legal liability or responsibility arising from the use of this product in a manner not intended by the author.DISCLAIMER (for Web Applications)This graphical representation is provided for informational purposes and should not be considered authoritative for navigational, engineering, legal, and other uses.DISCLAIMER AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY (for data/metadata)WARRANTYThese data are provided without warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied. The burden for determining fitness of use lies entirely with the user. The user is solely responsible for understanding the limitations of the data provided.LIABILITYThese data are intended for informational purposes and should not be considered authoritative for navigational, engineering, legal and other site-specific uses. In no event shall FDEP be liable for damages of any kind including loss of anticipated profits or benefits arising out of use of or reliance on these data.

procstep.procdesc: County boundaries between Martin and St. Lucie counties, and Gulf and Franklin counties updated.

overview.eaover:
NAME Textual county names in upper case
DEP_COUNTY Numeric code used in DEP's Regulatory Databases
FIPS_COUNTY County FIPS codes = ((County code * 2) - 1)
DEP_COUNTY NAME FIPS_COUNTY ---------- ---- ----------- 1 ALACHUA 1 2 BAKER 3 3 BAY 5 4 BRADFORD 7 5 BREVARD 9 6 BROWARD 11 7 CALHOUN 13 8 CHARLOTTE 15 9 CITRUS 17 10 CLAY 19 11 COLLIER 21 12 COLUMBIA 23 13 DADE 25 14 DESOTO 27 15 DIXIE 29 16 DUVAL 31 17 ESCAMBIA 33 18 FLAGLER 35 19 FRANKLIN 37 20 GADSDEN 39 21 GILCHRIST 41 22 GLADES 43 23 GULF 45 24 HAMILTON 47 25 HARDEE 49 26 HENDRY 51 27 HERNANDO 53 28 HIGHLANDS 55 29 HILLSBOROUGH 57 30 HOLMES 59 31 INDIAN RIVER 61 32 JACKSON 63 33 JEFFERSON 65 34 LAFAYETTE 67 35 LAKE 69 36 LEE 71 37 LEON 73 38 LEVY 75 39 LIBERTY 77 40 MADISON 79 41 MANATEE 81 42 MARION 83 43 MARTIN 85 44 MONROE 87 45 NASSAU 89 46 OKALOOSA 91 47 OKEECHOBEE 93 48 ORANGE 95 49 OSCEOLA 97 50 PALM BEACH 99 51 PASCO 101 52 PINELLAS 103 53 POLK 105 54 PUTNAM 107 55 ST. JOHNS 109 56 ST. LUCIE 111 57 SANTA ROSA 113 58 SARASOTA 115 59 SEMINOLE 117 60 SUMTER 119 61 SUWANNEE 121 62 TAYLOR 123 63 UNION 125 64 VOLUSIA 127 65 WAKULLA 129 66 WALTON 131 67 WASHINGTON 133
WATER Enables the differentiated shading of land and water for maps 0 = land 1 = water
